title: Projectile Inferno
description: Bullet hell game focused on design patterns, which used the Entity-Component-System architecture to satisfy SOLID, and promote code reuse.
challenges: Refactoring core game engine to optimize memory usage

title: Achiever
description: Todo list webapp, written in NodeJS and deployed to AWS Elastic Beanstalk
highlights: Planned and executed 4 1-week Agile style sprints

title: OceanGate DAQ
description: Modular networked data aquisition device based on Teensy 3.6, which collects data from multiple sensor types and transmits packages over UDP.

title: THEIA
description: Indoor navigation app for vision impaired users, focused on the determining and documenting requirements, then building the app based on requirements.

title: Questie
description: Contributed bug fixes and feature addtion to open source project Questie, which is a plugin for the MMO World of Warcraft
highlights: Feature pull request accepted and merged

title: Checkstyle Halstead Metrics
description: Extended the Checkstyle Eclipse plugin to add checks for various halstead metrics, including cyclomatic complexity and maintainability index.

title: IFMXSheets
description: Spreadsheet app written in C# with focus on basic design patterns. Implements an elegant polymorphic solution to Infix-to-postfix conversion, expression tree generation, and tree evaluation. Although the 'strategy' design pattern was not covered in the course, this solution is very similar to a strategy pattern.
highlights: Strategy design pattern for handling tokens
challenges: Avoiding infinite circular propagation of cell change events
